img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(103\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d9/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28103%29.png)
The fox will go right, but take a left first to collect a green Wisp up the slope. Then head in the direction that the fox went, to get to the edge of the cliff. She'll transform back into a human, and the next thing for you to do is to jump from the cliff and down into Furnace Valley.

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 69 from the file 'Woods_of_Ember_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(103\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/d/d9/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%28103%29.png)
The fox will go right, but take a left first to collect a green Wisp up the slope. Then head in the direction that the fox went, to get to the edge of the cliff. She'll transform back into a human, and the next thing for you to do is to jump from the cliff and down into Furnace Valley."
            - Following Text: "Woods of Ember Complete"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the "Woods of Ember" walkthrough, showing a character standing at the edge of a cliff overlooking a fiery, lava-filled chasm. This moment occurs after the character follows a fox that transforms into a human, leading them to the edge of the cliff. The next step in the game is to jump from the cliff into Furnace Valley, marking the completion of the "Woods of Ember" section.
